#version 450
layout(location = 0)in vec4 vertex_pair;
layout(location = 1)in unsigned int color_index;

layout(std140)uniform ColorBuffer{
	vec4 colorBuffer[1000];
};

out vec4 v_color;
void main(){
	gl_Position = vec4(vertex_pair[2*gl_VertexID], vertex_pair[2*gl_VertexID + 1], 0.0, 1.0);
	v_color = colorBuffer[color_index];
}
